body_html:
I'm a little worried about having to copy over libstdc++, particularly because it means that we're changing the library that programs expecting to use the anaconda version. You might want to check in on the anaconda forums about how to use an updated libstdc++ there.

But....glad to hear things are working.

body:
I'm a little worried about having to copy over libstdc++, particularly because it means that we're changing the library that programs expecting to use the anaconda version. You might want to check in on the anaconda forums about how to use an updated libstdc++ there.

But....glad to hear things are working.
